text: @realDonaldTrump Scientific or not, WEAR A MASK. There's no science saying you need to wear a shirt to shop in a store, but you do it anyway...Wearing a mask doesn't mean you don't love Trump, it doesn't mean you're a republican or a democrat, its just a new rule.#WearAMask #coronavirus #Covid_19
